titleStmt.title: A Poem upon occasion of the happy discovery of the late horrid plot against the life of His Most Sacred Majesty

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for A. Roper and E. Wilkinson,

notesStmt.note: "Not to be confused with 'A Poem occasion'd by the happy discovery of the horrid and most barbarous conspiracy', the present work begins 'Once more, ye sacred nine, my breast inspire'"--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
